name: Pink Butterfly

30.description: Heals 4 angels with the lowest HP

60.description: Deals extra 250% DMG to the enemy with the lowest current HP, and inflicts [Bleed] effect

90.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

introduction: The bell on the bow are making a jingle sound gracefully, and gradually it's getting closer and closer. Deliberately trying to avoid this gentle trap. Your eyes start to drift away. But these are all illusions.
